meanings.sent1: The hodgepodge of toys on the floor made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: She found a hodgepodge of buttons in her grandmother's sewing box.
meanings.sent3: The hodgepodge of colors in the painting created a whimsical effect.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a hodgepodge of thoughts, all tangled up.
meanings.sent5: The hodgepodge of scents in the kitchen made her nostalgic for her childhood.

meanings.sent1: The garden was a hodgepodge of flowers, each one unique.
meanings.sent2: The thrift store had a hodgepodge of vintage items for sale.
meanings.sent3: The hodgepodge of costumes at the party made it hard to recognize anyone.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelf was a hodgepodge of genres, from mystery to romance.
meanings.sent5: The hodgepodge of flavors in the dish created a surprisingly delicious combination.
